item.title: Debugging Windows: New Users, Powershell, and TLS
item.description: A little context I wanted to work on this PR in Infection Monkey. Basically, a very simple feature - make the Monkey create a new user, and try to create an HTTPS request as that new user. ToC A little context ToC More context How I wanted to do it The problems The first problem: The application failed to initialize properly (0xc0000124) The second problem: The response content cannot be parsed because the Internet Explorer engine is not available, or Internet Explorer's first-launch configuration is not complete.

item.title: The first Post
item.description: The blank page So many possibilities, but so much anxiety. How do I make this interesting? Who will even read this? Have I picked the best theme? What should my other posts be?
